member.name: T:Sudoku.Globalization.CountryCode
member.summary: Encapsulates a country code to tell different countries.
member.remarks: This is used for some formatted string output, i.e. a multi-language string.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Globalization.CountryCode.Default
member.summary: Indicates the language is none of them, which is the default value of this type.
